messages.content: ComfyUI-FatLabels is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows users to generate text with a font size option, which is useful for bigger labeling of nodes and can be used within image generations.
Where should the ComfyUI-FatLabels custom node be installed?
The ComfyUI-FatLabels custom node should be installed in the 'custom_nodes' folder of the ComfyUI installation.
How can users access the FatLabels node in ComfyUI?
Once installed, users can access the FatLabels node by searching for 'Fat', 'Labels', or 'FatLabels' within ComfyUI.
What are the main features of the FatLabels node?
The FatLabels node allows users to write custom text and choose a font size for the generated text.
How can the generated text from FatLabels be used in ComfyUI?
The generated text from FatLabels can be linked to an image preview or save image node in ComfyUI and can be included within image generations.
Who is the creator of ComfyUI-FatLabels?
ComfyUI-FatLabels was created by Jon D from aianimation.com.
What future updates are being considered for ComfyUI-FatLabels?
The creator is considering adding extra font options and colors to the FatLabels node in the future, if time allows.
